title: FULL AP BRAUM URF! | HOW BROKEN IS IT? - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: champs with alot of cc are amazing in urf. if your able to spam ability which slow stun or snar in urf mode than you have the right champ. i attempted full ap braum to see how fast i could stun and slow champs with my q and my passive.

body: SUB TO MY CHANNEL IF YOU WANT MORE CONTENT :)

replies.body: haha yeh looks like his q does. it also says magic damage in the q so i dont actually understand haha

> haha yeh looks like his q does. it also says magic damage in the q so i dont actually understand haha

A lot of abilities do magic damage but don't scale with ap like shyvanna w and e (since before this patch anyway) if an ability scales with ap it will be in blue writing in the ability description
braum doesnt increase his Q damage with AP, the only thing that increases with that is his ult
the q says something to do with magic damage i dont really know how it works haha 0:13
